mapper.select:
set @start_date := (select date_sub(#{date}, interval weekday(#{date}) day));
select u.id, (with recursive base as (select @start_date as dt, 0 as cnt union all select date_sub(dt, interval 1 week) as dt, IF(ws.state = 1, cnt + 1, cnt) as cnt from base left outer join weekly_results ws on date_format(dt, '%Y-%u') = ws.year_week and ws.id = u.id where ws.state = 1 or ws.state = 3) select max(cnt) from base) as streak from users u
